title: No Scoped Type Hierarchy on Binary Projects
description: When using the application, I encountered an issue where the scoped type hierarchy is not displayed for binary projects. I don't understand why this is happening.
OB: When I navigate to the scoped type hierarchy for a binary project (e.g. org.apache.ant), I see the message 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'. I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. By the way, can someone explain the meaning of this message?
EB: When I navigate to the scoped type hierarchy for a binary project (e.g. org.apache.ant), I expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. However, instead, I see the message 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.
